GP12vamp__u:5651: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ bahulāḥ samāḥ // VamP_40.38 //
GP12vamp__u:5658: bhavān dharmaparastveko nāhaṃ dharma samācare // VamP_40.41 //
GP12vamp__u:5660: gaccha śambara śailendraṃ mandaraṃ vada śaṅkaram // VamP_40.42 //
GP12vamp__u:5662: paribhuñjasi kenādya tava datto vadasva māma // VamP_40.43 //
GP12vamp__u:5664: tat kimarthaṃ nivasase māmanādṛtya mandare // VamP_40.44 //
GP12vamp__u:5666: yeyaṃ hi bhavataḥ patnī sā me śīghraṃ pradīyatām // VamP_40.45 //
GP12vamp__u:5667: ityuktaḥ sa tadā tena śambaro mandaraṃ drutam /
GP12vamp__u:5668: jagāma tatra yatrāste saha devyā pinākadhṛk // VamP_40.46 //
GP12vamp__u:5670: tamuttaraṃ haraḥ prāha śṛṇvatyā girikanyayā // VamP_40.47 //
GP12vamp__u:5672: tanna śaknomyahaṃ tyaktuṃ vinājñāṃ vṛkṣavairiṇaḥ // VamP_40.48 //
GP12vamp__u:5674: tadeṣā yātu svaṃ kāmaṃ nāhaṃ vārayituṃ kṣamaḥ // VamP_40.49 //
GP12vamp__u:5676: brūhi gatvāndhakaṃ vīra mama vākyaṃ vipaścitam // VamP_40.50 //
GP12vamp__u:5678: prāmadyūtaṃ paristīrya yo jeṣyati sa lapsyate // VamP_40.51 //
GP12vamp__u:5683: gaccha śīghraṃ mahābāho bherīṃ sānnāhikīṃ dṛḍhām /
GP12vamp__u:5687: sā tāḍitā balavatā bherī duryodhanena hi /
GP12vamp__u:5688: satvaraṃ bhairavaṃ rāvaṃ rurāva surabhī yathā // VamP_40.56 //
GP12vamp__u:5690: samāyātāḥ sabhāṃ tūrṇaṃ kimetaditi vādinaḥ // VamP_40.57 //
GP12vamp__u:5692: te cāpi balināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ sannaddhā yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // VamP_40.58 //
GP12vamp__u:5696: jambhaḥ kujambho huṇḍaśca tuhuṇḍaḥ śambaro baliḥ // VamP_40.60 //
GP12vamp__u:5698: ayaḥśuṅkuḥ śibiḥ śālvo vṛṣaparvā virocanaḥ // VamP_40.61 //
GP12vamp__u:5702: ete cānye ca bahavo mahāvīryā mahābalāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5705: mahācalaṃ mandaramabhyupeyivān sa kālapāśāvasito hi mandadhīḥ // VamP_40.64 //
GP12vamp__u:5710: prāhāmantraya śailāde ye sthitāstava śāsane // VamP_41.1 //
GP12vamp__u:5712: upaspṛśya jalaṃ śrīmān sasmāra gaṇanāyakān // VamP_41.2 //
GP12vamp__u:5719: ete rudrā iti khyātāḥ koṭya ekādaśaiva tu // VamP_41.5 //
GP12vamp__u:5723: ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭistathā koṭyaḥ skandanāmnaḥ kumārakān // VamP_41.7 //
GP12vamp__u:5727: ekaikaṃ prati deveśa tāvatyo hyapi mātaraḥ // VamP_41.9 //
GP12vamp__u:5729: ete śaivā iti proktāstava bhaktā gaṇeśvarāḥ // VamP_41.10 //
GP12vamp__u:5735: ime prāptā gaṇā yoddhuṃ mahāvratina uttamāḥ // VamP_41.13 //
GP12vamp__u:5737: nirāśrayā nāma gaṇāḥ samāyātā jagadguro // VamP_41.14 //
GP12vamp__u:5741: bhairavo viṣṇunā sārddhamabhedenārcito hi yai // VamP_41.16 //
GP12vamp__u:5744: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5750: tatastadadbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve gaṇeśvarāḥ suciraṃ vismitākṣāśca vailakṣyamagamat param // VamP_41.21 //
GP12vamp__u:5752: prāha prahasya deveśaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ gaṇādhipam // VamP_41.22 //
GP12vamp__u:5753: vismitāmī gaṇā deva sarva eva maheśvara /
GP12vamp__u:5754: mahāpāśupatānāṃ hi yat tvayāliṅganaṃ kṛtam // VamP_41.23 //
GP12vamp__u:5756: rūpaṃ jñānaṃ vivekaṃ ca vadasva svecchayā vibho // VamP_41.24 //
GP12vamp__u:5758: babhāṣe tān gaṇān sarvān bhāvābhāvavicāriṇaḥ // VamP_41.25 //
GP12vamp__u:5763: yo 'haṃ sa bhagavān viṣṇurviṣṇuryaḥ so 'hamavyayaḥ // VamP_41.27 //
GP12vamp__u:5766: yathāhaṃ vai parijñāto na bhavadbhistathā dhruvam /
GP12vamp__u:5768: tena jñānaṃ hi vai naṣṭaṃ nātastvāliṅgitā mayā /
GP12vamp__u:5771: bhavān hi nirmalaḥ suddhaḥ śāntaḥ suklo nirañjanaḥ // VamP_41.31 //
GP12vamp__u:5776: na tveva yogyā yūyaṃ hi mahājñānasya karhicit /
GP12vamp__u:5777: apavādabhayād guhyaṃ bhavatāṃ hi prakāśaye // VamP_41.34 //
GP12vamp__u:5787: ator'thaṃ na kṣipāmyadya bhavato narake 'dbhute // VamP_41.39 //
GP12vamp__u:5789: sa caiva sadṛśo loke vidyate sacarācare /
GP12vamp__u:5790: śvetamūrtiḥ sa gavān pīto rakto 'ñjanaprabhaḥ // VamP_41.40 //
GP12vamp__u:5791: na tasya sadṛśo loke vidyate sacarācare /
GP12vamp__u:5792: śvetamūrtiḥ sa bhagavān pīto rakto 'ñjanaprabhaḥ // VamP_41.41 //
GP12vamp__u:5793: tasmāt parataraṃ loke nānyad dharma hi vidyate /
GP12vamp__u:5794: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ caiva tāmasaṃ miśrakaṃ tathā /
GP12vamp__u:5795: sa eva dhatte bhagavān sarvapūjyaḥ sadāśivaḥ // VamP_41.42 //
GP12vamp__u:5800: tataḥ paśyanti hi gaṇāḥ tamīsaṃ vai śahasraśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5804: tata ekamukhaṃ bhūyo dadṛśuḥ śaṅkaraṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5805: raudraiśca vaiṣṇavaiścaiva vṛtaṃ cihnaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // VamP_41.47 //
GP12vamp__u:5808: yathā yathā trinayano rūpaṃ dhatte guṇāgraṇīḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5809: tathā tathā tvajāyanta mahāpāśupatā gaṇāḥ // VamP_41.49 //
GP12vamp__u:5812: kṣaṇācchvetaḥ kṣaṇād raktaḥ pīto nīlaḥ kṣaṇādapi // VamP_41.50 //
GP12vamp__u:5814: kṣaṇād bhavati rudrendraḥ kṣaṇācchaṃbhuḥ prabhākaraḥ // VamP_41.51 //
GP12vamp__u:5822: parituṣṭo 'smi vaḥ sarve jñānenānena suvratāḥ // VamP_41.55 //
GP12vamp__u:5825: bhinnadṛṣṭyudbhavaṃ pāpaṃ yattad bhraṃśaṃ prayātu naḥ // VamP_41.56 //
GP12vamp__u:5832: nīlājinātatatanuḥ śaradabhravarṇo yadvad vibhāti balavān vṛṣabho harasya // VamP_41.59 //
GP12vamp__u:5843: mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ dadṛśe pitaraṃ tathā // VamP_42.4 //
GP12vamp__u:5845: kiṃ tiṣṭhasi jagannātha samuttiṣṭha raṇotsukaḥ // VamP_42.5 //
GP12vamp__u:5848: tato girisutā devaṃ samāliṅgya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5849: samīkṣya sasnehaharaṃ prāha gaccha jayāndhakam // VamP_42.7 //
GP12vamp__u:5852: tato haraḥ prāha vaco yaśasyaṃ mālinīmapi /
GP12vamp__u:5853: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva jayantīṃ cāparājitām // VamP_42.9 //
GP12vamp__u:5856: iti saṃdiśya tāḥ sarvāḥ samāruhya vṛṣaṃ vibhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5857: nirjagāma gṛhāt tuṣṭo jayepsuḥ śūladhṛg balī // VamP_42.11 //
GP12vamp__u:5860: raṇāya nirgacchati lokapāle maheśvare śūladhare maharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:5861: śubhāni saumyāni sumaṅgalāni jātānī cihnāni jayāya śaṃbhoḥ // VamP_42.13 //
GP12vamp__u:5862: śivā sthitā vāmatare 'tha bhāge prayāti cāgre svanamunnadantī /
GP12vamp__u:5863: kravyādasaṃghāś ca tathāmiṣaiṇaḥ prayānti hṛṣṭāstṛṣitāsṛgarthe // VamP_42.14 //
GP12vamp__u:5865: śakuniś cāpi hārīto maunī yāti parāṅgamukhaḥ // VamP_42.15 //
GP12vamp__u:5867: śailādiṃ prāha vacanaṃ sasmitaṃ śaśiśekharaḥ // VamP_42.16 //
GP12vamp__u:5869: nandin jajo 'dya me bhāvī na kathañcit parājayaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5872: kaḥ saṃdeho mahādeva yat tvaṃ jayasi śātravān // VamP_42.18 //
GP12vamp__u:5884: gaṇāstaddānavaṃ sainyaṃ jighāṃsanti sma kopitāḥ // VamP_42.24 //
GP12vamp__u:5889: taṃ bhrāmayāno balavān nijaghāna raṇe gaṇān /
GP12vamp__u:5896: śatadhā tvagamad brahman meroḥ kūṭa ivāśaniḥ // VamP_42.30 //
GP12vamp__u:5897: parighaṃ viphalaṃ dṛṣṭvā samāyāntaṃ ca pārṣadam /
GP12vamp__u:5898: babandha bāhupāśena rāhū rakṣan hi mātulam // VamP_42.31 //
GP12vamp__u:5901: kāṣṭhavat sa dvidhā bhūto nipapāta dharātale /
GP12vamp__u:5903: sa mokṣārthe 'karod yatnaṃ na śaśāka ca nārada // VamP_42.33 //
GP12vamp__u:5904: vināyakaṃ saṃyatamīkṣya rāhuṇā kuṇḍodaro nāma gaṇeśvaro 'tha /
GP12vamp__u:5905: pragṛhya tūrṇa muśalaṃ mahātmā rāhuṃ durātmānamasau jaghāna // VamP_42.34 //
GP12vamp__u:5906: tato gaṇeśaḥ kalaśadhvajastu prāsena rāhuṃ hṛdaye bibheda /
GP12vamp__u:5907: ghaṭodaro vai gadayā jaghāna khaḍgena rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sukeśī // VamP_42.35 //
GP12vamp__u:5910: hate tuhuṇḍe vimukhe ca rāhau gaṇeśvarāḥ krodhaviṣaṃ mumukṣavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5913: gadāṃ samāvidhya jaghāna mūrdhni vināyakaṃ kumbhataṭe kare ca // VamP_42.38 //
GP12vamp__u:5916: gaṇādhipāṃstān vimukhān sa kṛtvā balanvito vīrataro 'surendraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5917: samabhyadhāvat tvarito nihantuṃ gaṇeśvarān skandaviśākhamukhyān // VamP_42.40 //
GP12vamp__u:5918: tamāpatantaṃ bhagavān samīkṣya maheśvaraḥ śreṣṭhatamaṃ gaṇānām /
GP12vamp__u:5919: śailādimāmantrya vaco babhāṣe gacchasva daityān jahi vīra yuddha // VamP_42.41 //
GP12vamp__u:5921: baliṃ sambhyetya jaghāna mūrdhni saṃmohitaḥ so 'vanimāsasāda // VamP_42.42 //
GP12vamp__u:5922: saṃmohitaṃ bhrātṛsutaṃ viditvā balī kujambho musalaṃ pragṛhya /
GP12vamp__u:5923: saṃbhrāmayaṃstūrṇataraṃ sa vegāt sasarja nandiṃ prati jātakopaḥ // VamP_42.43 //
GP12vamp__u:5924: tamāpatantaṃ musalaṃ pragṛhya kareṇa tūrṇa bhagavān sa nandī /
GP12vamp__u:5925: jaghāna tenaiva kujambhamāhave sa prāṇahīno nipapāta bhūmau // VamP_42.44 //
GP12vamp__u:5926: hatvā kujambhaṃ musalena nandī vajreṇa vīraḥ śataśo jaghāna /
GP12vamp__u:5927: te vadhyamānā gaṇanāyakena duryodhanaṃ vai śaraṇaṃ prapannāḥ // VamP_42.45 //
GP12vamp__u:5929: prāsaṃ samāvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ nandiṃ pracikṣepa hato 'si vai bruvan // VamP_42.46 //
GP12vamp__u:5930: tamāpatantaṃ kuliśena nandī bibheda guhyaṃ piśuno yathā naraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5931: tatprāsamālakṣya tadā nikṛttaṃ saṃvarttya muṣṭiṃ gaṇamāsasāda // VamP_42.47 //
GP12vamp__u:5932: tato 'sya nandī kulisena tṛrṇa śiro 'cchinat tālaphalaprakāśam /
GP12vamp__u:5933: hato 'tha bhūmau nipapāta vegād daityāśca bhītā vigatā diśo daśa // VamP_42.48 //
GP12vamp__u:5934: tato hataṃ svaṃ tanayaṃ nirīkṣya hastī tadā nandinamājagāma /
GP12vamp__u:5938: parāṅmukhān vīkṣya gaṇān kumāraḥ śaktyā pṛṣatkāntha vārayitvā /
GP12vamp__u:5939: tūrṇaṃ sabhabhyetya ripuṃ samīkṣya pragṛhya śaktyā hṛdaye vibheda // VamP_42.51 //
GP12vamp__u:5941: mamāra cāripṛtanā jātā bhūyaḥ parāṅmukhī // VamP_42.52 //
GP12vamp__u:5943: purato nandinaṃ kṛtvā jighāṃsanti sma dānavān // VamP_42.53 //
GP12vamp__u:5951: taṃ paṭṭiśaṃ bhrāmya jaghāna mūrdhni kārtasvaraṃ visvaramunnadantam // VamP_42.57 //
GP12vamp__u:5953: babandha vīraḥ saha paṭṭiśena gaṇeśvaraṃ cāpyatha nandiṣeṇam // VamP_42.58 //
GP12vamp__u:5954: nandiṣeṇaṃ tathā baddhaṃ samīkṣya balināṃ varaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5962: sa tribhiḥ śaṅkarasutaiḥ pīḍyamāno jahau paṇam /
GP12vamp__u:5963: te prāptāḥ śambaraṃ tūrṇaṃ prekṣyamāṇā gaṇeśvarāḥ // VamP_42.63 //
GP12vamp__u:5967: diśo 'tha bheje devarṣe kumāraḥ sainyamardayat // VamP_42.65 //
GP12vamp__u:5969: viṣaṇṇārūpā bhayavihvalāṅgī jagāma sukraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhayārtā // VamP_42.66 //
GP12vamp__u:5974: andhako 'bhyetya śukraṃ tu idaṃ vacanamabravīt // VamP_43.1 //
GP12vamp__u:5977: tadiyaṃ paśya bhagavan mayā guptā varūthinī /
GP12vamp__u:5978: anāthena yathā nārī pramathairapi kālyate // VamP_43.3 //
GP12vamp__u:5981: tasmāt kuruṣva śreyo no na jīyema yathā paraiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5982: jayema ca parān yuddhe tathā tvaṃ kurtumarhasi // VamP_43.5 //
GP12vamp__u:5985: tvaddhitārtha yatiṣyāmi kariṣyāmi tava priyam // VamP_43.6 //
GP12vamp__u:5989: ye hatāḥ prathamaṃ yuddhe dānavāste samutthitāḥ // VamP_43.8 //
GP12vamp__u:5992: mahādeva vaco mahyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ paramādbhutam /
GP12vamp__u:5993: avicintyamasahyaṃ ca mṛtānāṃ jīvanaṃ punaḥ // VamP_43.10 //
GP12vamp__u:5995: te samujjīvitā bhūyo bhārgāveṇātha vidyāyā // VamP_43.11 //
GP12vamp__u:6001: ahaṃ taṃ saṃyamiṣyāmi yathāyogaṃ sametya hi // VamP_43.14 //
GP12vamp__u:6005: saṃrurodha tadā mārgaṃ sihasyeva paśurvane // VamP_43.16 //
GP12vamp__u:6007: sa papātātha niḥsaṃjño yayau nandī tatastvaran // VamP_43.17 //
GP12vamp__u:6014: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān brahma prāha śakrapurogamān /
GP12vamp__u:6023: rathād bhārgavamākrāmat siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // VamP_43.25 //
GP12vamp__u:6025: nipātya rakṣiṇaḥ sarvānatha śukraṃ nyavedayat // VamP_43.26 //
GP12vamp__u:6026: tamānītaṃ kaviṃ śarvaḥ prākṣipad vadane prabhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6027: bhārgavaṃ tvāvṛtatanuṃ jaṭhare sa nyaveśayat // VamP_43.27 //
GP12vamp__u:6032: śaṅkarāya maheśāya tryambakāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.29 //
GP12vamp__u:6034: madanāgne kālaśatro vāmadevāya te namaḥ // VamP_43.30 //
GP12vamp__u:6036: mahādevāya śarvāya īśvarāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.31 //
GP12vamp__u:6037: trinayana hara bhava śaṅkara umāpate jīmūtaketo śuhāgṛha śmaśānanirata bhūtivilepana sūlapāṇe paśupate gopate tatpuruṣasattma namo namaste |
GP12vamp__u:6038: itthaṃ stutaḥ kavivarema haro 'tha bhaktyā prīto varaṃ varaya dadmi tavetyuvāca /
GP12vamp__u:6039: sa prāha devavara dehi varaṃ mamādya yadvai tavaiva jaṭharāt pratinirgamo 'stu // VamP_43.32 //
GP12vamp__u:6040: tato haro 'kṣīṇi tadā nirudhya prāha dvijendrādya vinirgamasva /
GP12vamp__u:6041: ityuktamātro vibhunā cacāra devodare bhārgavapuṅgavastu // VamP_43.33 //
GP12vamp__u:6047: vṛkṣagulmān girīn vallyaḥ phalamūlauṣadhāni ca // VamP_43.36 //
GP12vamp__u:6052: tatrāsato bhārgavasya divyaḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ // VamP_43.38 //
GP12vamp__u:6054: sa śrantaṃ vīkṣya cātmānaṃ nālabhannirgamaṃ vaśī /
GP12vamp__u:6058: sahasrākṣa mahādeva tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.40 //
GP12vamp__u:6059: namo 'stu te śaṅkara śarva śaṃbho sahasranetrāṅghribhujaṅgabhūṣaṇa /
GP12vamp__u:6060: dṛṣṭvaiva sarvān bhuvanāṃstavodare śrānto bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ // VamP_43.41 //
GP12vamp__u:6061: ityevamukte vacane mahātmā śaṃbhurvacaḥ prāha tato vihasya /
GP12vamp__u:6062: nirgaccha putro 'si mamādhunā tvaṃ śiśnena bho bhārgavavaṃśacandra // VamP_43.42 //
GP12vamp__u:6063: nāmnā tu śukreti carācarāstvāṃ stoṣyanti naivātra vicāramanyat /
GP12vamp__u:6064: ityevamuktvā bhagavān mumoca śiśnena śukraṃ sa ca nirjagāma // VamP_43.43 //
GP12vamp__u:6066: praṇamya śaṃbhuṃ sa jagāma tūrṇa mahāsurāṇāṃ balamuttamaujāḥ // VamP_43.44 //
GP12vamp__u:6070: yuyudhuḥ saṃkulaṃ yuddhaṃ sarva eva jayepsavaḥ // VamP_43.46 //
GP12vamp__u:6080: hastī ca kuṇḍajaṭharaṃ hlādo vīraṃ ghaṭodaram /
GP12vamp__u:6081: ete hi balināṃ śreṣṭhā dānavāḥ pramathāstathā /
GP12vamp__u:6082: saṃyodhayanti devarṣe divyābdānāṃ śatani ṣaṭ // VamP_43.51 //
GP12vamp__u:6084: vārayāmāsa balavān jambho nāma mahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.52 //
GP12vamp__u:6088: dvimūrdhā pavanaṃ somaṃ rāhurmitraṃ virūpadhṛk // VamP_43.54 //
GP12vamp__u:6089: aṣṭau ye vasavaḥ khyātā dharādyāste mahāsurān /
GP12vamp__u:6094: eka eva raṇe raudraḥ kālanemirmahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.57 //
GP12vamp__u:6100: kṛtāni ca surābdānāṃ daśatīḥ ṣaṭ mahāmune // VamP_43.60 //
GP12vamp__u:6102: tadā māyaṃ samāśritya grasantaḥ kramaśo 'vyayān // VamP_43.61 //
GP12vamp__u:6105: dṛṣṭvā śūnyaṃ giriprasthaṃ grastāṃś ca pramathāmarān /

GP12vamp__u:8153: viśveśvarāya devāya śivāya haraye namaḥ // VamP_58.36 //
GP12vamp__u:8158: guhyāya vedanilayāya mahodarāya siṃhāya daityanidhanāya caturbhujāya /
GP12vamp__u:8161: pītāmbarāya madhukaiṭabhanāśanāya viśvāya cārumukuṭāya namo 'jarāya // VamP_58.40 //
GP12vamp__u:8163: nānāvicitramukuṭāṅgadabhūṣaṇāya sarveśvarāya varadāya namo varāya // VamP_58.41 //
GP12vamp__u:8165: devendravighnaśamanodyatapauruṣāya yogeśvarāya virajāya namo varāya // VamP_58.42 //
GP12vamp__u:8169: yugāntaśeṣaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ taṃ devadevaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // VamP_58.44 //
GP12vamp__u:8170: yogeśvaraṃ cāruvicitramaulim ajñeyam agryaṃ prakṛteḥ parastham /
GP12vamp__u:8171: kṣetrajñamātmaprabhavaṃ vareṇyaṃ taṃ vāsudevaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadya // VamP_58.45 //
GP12vamp__u:8173: vadanti yaṃ vai puruṣaṃ sanātanaṃ taṃ devaguhyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // VamP_58.46 //
GP12vamp__u:8174: yadakṣaraṃ brahma vadanti sarvagaṃ niśamya yaṃ mṛtyumukhāt pramucyate /
GP12vamp__u:8175: tamīśvaraṃ tṛptamanuttamairguṇaiḥ parāyaṇaṃ viṣṇumupaimi sāśvatam // VamP_58.47 //
GP12vamp__u:8177: mahābalaṃ vedanidhiṃ sureśaṃ va3jāmi viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ janārdanam // VamP_58.48 //
GP12vamp__u:8180: bhavodbhavaṃ vedavidāṃ pariṣṭhaṃ yogātmanāṃ sāṃkhyavidāṃ variṣṭham /

GP12vamp__u:8187: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ bhaktyā prapadye bhaktavatsalam // VamP_58.53 //
GP12vamp__u:8192: namo varāya devāya namaḥ sarvasahāya ca /
GP12vamp__u:8197: kīrtayanti ca yaṃ sarve brahmādīnāṃ parāyaṇam // VamP_58.58 //
GP12vamp__u:8199: subrahmaṇya namaste 'stu trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam // VamP_58.59 //
GP12vamp__u:8205: grāhagrastaṃ gajendraṃ taṃ taṃ ca grāhaṃ jalāśayāt /
GP12vamp__u:8210: grāhatvamagamat kṛṣṇād vadhaṃ prāpya divaṃ gataḥ // VamP_58.64 //
GP12vamp__u:8211: gajo 'pi viṣṇunā spṛṣṭo jāto divyavapuḥ pumān /
GP12vamp__u:8214: abhavat tvatha deveśastābhyāṃ caiva prapūjitaḥ // VamP_58.66 //
GP12vamp__u:8215: idaṃ ca bhagavān yogī gajendraṃ śaraṇāgatam /
GP12vamp__u:8218: yo māṃ tvāñca saraścaiva grāhasya ca vidāraṇam /
GP12vamp__u:8222: kīrtayiṣyanti bhaktyā ca śroṣyanti ca śucivrataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8223: duḥsvapno naśyate teṣāṃ susvapnaśca bhaviṣyati // VamP_58.70 //
GP12vamp__u:8224: mātsyaṃ kaurmañca vārāhaṃ vāmanaṃ tārkṣyameva ca /
GP12vamp__u:8230: sparśayāmāsa hastena gajaṃ gandharvameva ca // VamP_58.73 //
GP12vamp__u:8236: gataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇurdurvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ // VamP_58.76 //
GP12vamp__u:8238: vavandire mahātmānaṃ prabhuṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim // VamP_58.77 //
GP12vamp__u:8244: prāpnuyāt paramāṃ siddhiṃ duḥsvapnastasya naśyati // VamP_58.80 //
GP12vamp__u:8248: etatpavitraṃ paramaṃ supuṇyaṃ saṃkīrtanīyaṃ caritaṃ murāreḥ /

GP12vamp__u:8250: ajaṃ vareṇyaṃ varapadmanābhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ brahmanidhiṃ sureśam /
GP12vamp__u:8251: taṃ devaguhyaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ vandāmyahaṃ lokapatiṃ vareṇyam // VamP_58.83 //
GP12vamp__u:8253: etat tavoktaṃ pravaraṃ stavānāṃ stavaṃ murārervaranāgakīrtanam /
GP12vamp__u:8254: yaṃ kīrtya saṃśrutya tathā vicintya pāpāpanodaṃ puruṣo labheta // VamP_58.84 //
GP12vamp__u:8261: sa tvāyuṣi parikṣiṇe jajñe ghoro niśācaraḥ // VamP_59.2 //
GP12vamp__u:8263: kruraiścakre tato vṛttiṃ rākṣasatvād viśeṣataḥ // VamP_59.3 //
GP12vamp__u:8266: yaṃ yaṃ paśyati sattvaṃ sa taṃ tamādāya rākṣasaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8269: jagāma ca mahān kālaḥ pariṇāmaṃ tathā vayaḥ // VamP_59.6 //
GP12vamp__u:8285: te yāntu saumyatāṃ sadyo garuḍeneva pannagāḥ // VamP_59.14 //
GP12vamp__u:8286: ye kūṣmāṇḍāstathā yakṣā daityā ye ca niśācarāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8287: pretā vināyakāḥ krūrā manuṣyā jṛmbhakāḥ khagāḥ // VamP_59.15 //
GP12vamp__u:8289: sarve bhavantu me saumyā viṣṇucakraravāhatāḥ // VamP_59.16 //
GP12vamp__u:8290: cittavṛttiharā ye ca ye janāḥ smṛtīhārakāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8296: pṛṣṭhe purastādatha dakṣiṇottare vikoṇataścāstu najārdano hariḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8297: tamīḍyamīśānamanantamacyutaṃ janārdanaṃ praṇipatito na sīdati // VamP_59.20 //
GP12vamp__u:8298: yathā paraṃ brahma haristathā paraṃ jagatsvarūpaśca sa eva keśavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8305: jāte japyāvasāne 'sau ta dadarśa niśācaram // VamP_59.24 //
GP12vamp__u:8307: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpayāviṣṭaḥ samāśvāsya niśācaram // VamP_59.25 //
GP12vamp__u:8309: svabhāvamātmano draṣṭuṃ rakṣayā tejasaḥ kṣitim // VamP_59.26 //
GP12vamp__u:8310: kathayitvā ca tadrakṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ vividhaṃ tataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8311: prasīdetyabravīd vipraṃ nirviṇṇāḥ svena karmaṇā // VamP_59.27 //
GP12vamp__u:8313: kṛtāḥ striyo mayā bahvyo vidhavāḥ putravarjitāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8314: anāgasāṃ ca sattvānāmalpakānāṃ kṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ // VamP_59.28 //
GP12vamp__u:8318: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya dvijottamaḥ // VamP_59.30 //
GP12vamp__u:8323: tvāṃ vai samāgato 'smyadya kṣipto 'haṃ rakṣayā balāt /
GP12vamp__u:8324: tava saṃsargato brahman jāto nirveda uttamaḥ // VamP_59.32 //
GP12vamp__u:8325: kā sā rakṣā na tāṃ vedmi vedmi nāsyāḥ parāyaṇam /
GP12vamp__u:8326: yasyāḥ saṃsargasāsādya nirvedaṃ prāpitaṃ param // VamP_59.33 //
GP12vamp__u:8328: yathā pāpāpanodo me bhavatyārya tathā kuru // VamP_59.34 //
GP12vamp__u:8330: ityevamuktaḥ sa munistadā vai tena rakṣasā /
GP12vamp__u:8331: pratyuvāca mahābhāgo vimṛśya suciraṃ muniḥ // VamP_59.35 //
GP12vamp__u:8336: tān saṃpṛccha dvijān saumya ye vai pravacane ratāḥ // VamP_59.37 //
GP12vamp__u:8339: na cakhāda sa sattvāni kṣudhā saṃbādhito 'pi san /
GP12vamp__u:8340: ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe tadā kāle jantumekamabhakṣayat // VamP_59.39 //
GP12vamp__u:8343: gṛhīto rakṣasā tena sa tadā munidārakaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8344: nirāśo jīvite prāha sāmapūrvaṃ niśācaram // VamP_59.41 //
GP12vamp__u:8346: bho bhadra brūhi yat kāryaṃ gṛhīto yena hetunā /
GP12vamp__u:8347: tadanubrūhi bhadraṃ te ayamasmyanuśādhi mām // VamP_59.42 //
GP12vamp__u:8353: āyāsyāmi tavādyaiva nivedya gurave phalam // VamP_59.44 //
GP12vamp__u:8355: mamātra niṣṭhā prāptasya phalāni viniveditum // VamP_59.45 //
GP12vamp__u:8359: ṣaṣṭhe kāle na me brahman kaścid grahaṇamāgataḥ /

GP12vamp__u:8361: eka evātra mokṣasya tava hetuḥ śṛṇuṣva tat /
GP12vamp__u:8365: tatkariṣyāmyahaṃ rakṣo yanna vrataharaṃ mama // VamP_59.49 //
GP12vamp__u:8368: nirvivekena cittena pāpakarma sadā kṛtam // VamP_59.50 //
GP12vamp__u:8369: ābālyānmama pāpeṣu na dharmeṣu rataṃ manaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8370: tatpāpāsaṃkṣayānmokṣaṃ prāpnuyāṃ yena tad vada // VamP_59.51 //
GP12vamp__u:8372: duṣṭāṃ yonimimāṃ prāpya tanmuktiṃ kathaya dvija // VamP_59.52 //
GP12vamp__u:8376: ṣaṣṭhe kāle nṛśaṃsātmā bhakṣayiṣyāmi nirghṛṇaḥ // VamP_59.54 //
GP12vamp__u:8380: sa vimṛśya ciraṃ vipraḥ śaraṇaṃ jātavedasam /
GP12vamp__u:8381: jagāma jñānadānāya saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.56 //
GP12vamp__u:8383: vratāni vā sucīrṇāni saptārciḥ pātu māṃ tataḥ // VamP_59.57 //
GP12vamp__u:8384: na mātaraṃ na pitaraṃ gauraveṇa yathā gurum /
GP12vamp__u:8385: sarvadaivāvagacchāmi tathā māṃ pātu pāvakaḥ // VamP_59.58 //
GP12vamp__u:8386: yathā guruṃ na manasā karmaṇā vacasāpi vā /
GP12vamp__u:8387: avajānāmyahaṃ tena pātu satyena pāvakaḥ // VamP_59.59 //
GP12vamp__u:8388: ityevaṃ manasā satyān kurvataḥ śapathān punaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8391: mā bhairdvijasutāhaṃ tvāṃ mokṣayiṣyāmi saṃkaṭāt // VamP_59.61 //

GP12vamp__u:8394: adṛśyā rakṣasā tena proktvetthaṃ sā sarasvatī /

GP12vamp__u:8400: asaṃśayaṃ sadā japyo japatāṃ puṣṭiśāntidaḥ // VamP_59.65 //
GP12vamp__u:8401: oṃ hariṃ kuṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ vāsudevaṃ janārdanam /
GP12vamp__u:8402: praṇato 'smi jagannāthaṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.66 //
GP12vamp__u:8404: praṇato 'smi paraṃ devaṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.67 //
GP12vamp__u:8406: praṇato 'smi patiṃ lakṣmyāḥ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.68 //
GP12vamp__u:8408: praṇato 'smi stutaṃ stutyaiḥ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.69 //
GP12vamp__u:8410: praṇato 'smi dharādhāraṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.70 //
GP12vamp__u:8412: praṇato 'smi mahābāhuṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.71 //
GP12vamp__u:8414: praṇato 'smi śriyaḥ kāntaṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.72 //
GP12vamp__u:8418: dhyāyanti vāsudevākhyaṃ tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.74 //
GP12vamp__u:8420: vāsudevaṃ paraṃ brahma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.75 //
GP12vamp__u:8422: karmakṣaye 'kṣayaṃ devaṃ tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.76 //
GP12vamp__u:8424: na yoginaḥ prāpnuvanti tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.77 //
GP12vamp__u:8426: yaḥ sṛjatyacyuto devastamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.78 //
GP12vamp__u:8428: prabhuḥ purātano jajñe tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.79 //
GP12vamp__u:8430: sraṣṭṛtve saṃsthitaṃ sṛṣṭau praṇato 'smi sanātanam // VamP_59.80 //
GP12vamp__u:8433: dhṛtā mahī hatā daityāḥ paritrātāstathā surāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8434: yena taṃ viṣṇumādyeśaṃ praṇato 'smi janārdanam // VamP_59.82 //
GP12vamp__u:8436: taṃ yajñapuruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ praṇato 'smi sanātanam // VamP_59.83 //
GP12vamp__u:8440: yo vai nṛtyati rudrātmā praṇato 'smi janārdanam // VamP_59.85 //
GP12vamp__u:8442: saṃbhūtā yasya devasya sarvagaṃ taṃ namāmyaham // VamP_59.86 //
GP12vamp__u:8444: yasyāṃśabhūtā devasya sarvagaṃ taṃ nato 'smayaham // VamP_59.87 //
GP12vamp__u:8446: ekāṃśabhūtā devasya sarvagaṃ taṃ namāmyaham // VamP_59.88 //
GP12vamp__u:8447: yasmānnānyat paraṃ kiñcid yasmin sarvaṃ mahātmani /
GP12vamp__u:8448: yaḥ sarvamadhyago 'nantaḥ sarvagaṃ taṃ namāmyaham // VamP_59.89 //
GP12vamp__u:8450: viṣṇurevaṃ tathā pāpaṃ mamāśeṣaṃ praṇaśyatu // VamP_59.90 //
GP12vamp__u:8452: yacca jñānaparicchedyaṃ pāpaṃ naśyatu me tathā // VamP_59.91 //
GP12vamp__u:8454: anekajanmakarmotthaṃ pāpaṃ naśyatu me tathā // VamP_59.92 //
GP12vamp__u:8456: saṃdhyayośca kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karmaṇā manasā girā // VamP_59.93 //
GP12vamp__u:8457: yat tiṣṭhatā yad vrajatā yacca śayyāgatena me /
GP12vamp__u:8458: kṛtaṃ yadaśubhaṃ karma kāyena manasā girā // VamP_59.94 //
GP12vamp__u:8460: tat kṣipraṃ vilayaṃ yātu vāsudevasya kīrtanāt // VamP_59.95 //
GP12vamp__u:8463: yacca bhojye tathā peye bhakṣye coṣye vilehane /
GP12vamp__u:8464: tad yātu vilayaṃ toye yathā lavaṇabhājanam // VamP_59.97 //
GP12vamp__u:8465: yad bālye yacca kaumāre yat pāpaṃ yauvane mama /
GP12vamp__u:8466: vayaḥpariṇatau yacca yacca janmātare kṛtam // VamP_59.98 //
GP12vamp__u:8468: prayātu vilayaṃ toye yathā lavaṇabhājanam // VamP_59.99 //
GP12vamp__u:8470: janārdanāya kṛṣṇāya namo bhūyo namo namaḥ // VamP_59.100 //
GP12vamp__u:8474: ko 'nyo nāśayati balād darpaṃ haihayabhūpateḥ // VamP_59.102 //
GP12vamp__u:8482: kṛtaṃ tena tu yat pāpaṃ saptajanmāntarāṇi vai /
GP12vamp__u:8487: ahanyahani yo dadyāt paṭhatyetacca tatsamam // VamP_59.108 //
GP12vamp__u:8490: yathaitat stayamuktaṃ me na hyalpamapi me mṛṣā /
GP12vamp__u:8496: etad bhadra mayā khyātaṃ tava pātakanāśanam /
GP12vamp__u:8497: viṣṇoḥ sārasvataṃ stotraṃ yajjagāda sarasvatī // VamP_59.112 //
GP12vamp__u:8499: jagādainaṃ stavaṃ viṣṇoḥ sarveṣāṃ copaśāntidam // VamP_59.113 //
GP12vamp__u:8501: tataḥ śāpāpanodaṃ tu stute lapsyasi keśave // VamP_59.114 //
GP12vamp__u:8503: stuhi bhaktiṃ dṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ pāpād vimokṣyase // VamP_59.115 //
GP12vamp__u:8505: stuto hi bhaktyā nṝṇāṃ vai sarvapāpaharo hariḥ // VamP_59.116 //
GP12vamp__u:8507: tataḥ praṇamya taṃ vipraṃ prasādya sa niśācaraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8508: tadaiva tapase śrīmān śālagrāmamagād vaśī // VamP_59.117 //
GP12vamp__u:8509: aharniśaṃ sa evainaṃ japan sārasvataṃ stavam /
GP12vamp__u:8513: etat te kathitaṃ brahman viṣṇoḥ sārasvataṃ stavam /
GP12vamp__u:8515: ya etat paramaṃ stotraṃ vāsudevasya mānavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8516: paṭhaṣyati sa sarvebhyaḥ pāpebhyo mokṣamāpsyati // VamP_59.121 //
GP12vamp__u:8521: vāsudeva namaste 'stu bahurūpa namo 'stu te // VamP_60.1 //
GP12vamp__u:8525: dhruvadhvaja namasto 'stu satyadhvaja namo 'stu te // VamP_60.3 //
GP12vamp__u:8529: namo jayanta vijaya jayānanta parājita // VamP_60.5 //
GP12vamp__u:8535: namo hiraṇyagarbhāya padmagarbhāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.8 //
GP12vamp__u:8537: kālanābha namastubhyaṃ mahānābha namo namaḥ // VamP_60.9 //
GP12vamp__u:8539: dharmāvāsa jalāvāsa śrīnivāsa namo 'stu te // VamP_60.10 //
GP12vamp__u:8541: senādhyakṣa namastubhyaṃ kālādhyakṣa namo namaḥ // VamP_60.11 //
GP12vamp__u:8546: sarvātman sarvaga vibho viriñce śveta keśava /
GP12vamp__u:8547: nīla rakta mahānīla aniruddha namo 'stu te // VamP_60.14 //
GP12vamp__u:8549: vyomakātmaka subrahman bhūtātmaka namo 'stu te // VamP_60.15 //
GP12vamp__u:8551: muñjakeśa hṛṣīkeśa sarvanātha mano 'stu te // VamP_60.16 //
GP12vamp__u:8555: govinda prītikartā ca haṃsa pītāmbarapriya // VamP_60.18 //
GP12vamp__u:8562: namaste dharmanetrāya mahānetrāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.21 //
GP12vamp__u:8564: namo yajñavarāhāya mahārūpāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.22 //
GP12vamp__u:8569: mūlaṃ te brāhmaṇā brahman skandhaste kṣatriyordiśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8571: brāhmaṇāḥ sāgnayo vaktrāḥ derdaṇḍāḥ sāyudhā nṛpāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8573: netrād bhānurabhūt tubhyaṃ padbhyāṃ bhūḥ śrotrayordiśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8575: prāṇād vāyuḥ samabhavat kāmād brahmā pitāmahaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8576: krodhāt trinayano rudraḥ śīrṣṇoḥ dyauḥ samavartata // VamP_60.28 //
GP12vamp__u:8578: oṣadhyo romasaṃbhūtā virājastvaṃ namo 'stu te // VamP_60.29 //
GP12vamp__u:8580: oṅkārastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāro vauṣaṭ tvaṃ ca svadhā sudhā // VamP_60.30 //
GP12vamp__u:8582: sarvākāra nirākāra vedākāra namo 'stu te // VamP_60.31 //

GP12vamp__u:9020: taṃ bāndhavāśca pitarau mātā bhrātā gurustathā /

GP12vamp__u:9022: tataḥ sa pitrā kruddhena kṣiptaḥ kūpe nirūdake /
GP12vamp__u:9025: tasya mātāgamat kūpaṃ tamandhaṃ śilayācitam // VamP_64.49 //
GP12vamp__u:9027: tasya mātāgamat kūpaṃ tamandhaṃ śilayācitam // VamP_64.50 //
GP12vamp__u:9028: sā dṛṣṭāvā nicitaṃ kūpaṃ śilayā girikalpayā /

GP12vamp__u:9422: 67.22 saṃsmṛto 'si mayā tāta suviṣaṇṇena cetasā tanme hitaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca śreyogryaṃ vada tāta me /

GP12vamp__u:9424: kṛtena yena vai nāsya bandhaḥ samupajāyate /

GP12vamp__u:9434: viṣamaviṣayatoye majjatāmaplāvānāṃ bhavati śaraṇameko viṣṇupoto narāṇām // VamP_67.28 //
GP12vamp__u:9435: ye saṃśritā harimanantamanādimadhyaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ śubhadaṃ vareṇyam /

GP12vamp__u:9440: ye viṣṇubhaktāḥ puruṣāḥ pṛthivyāṃ yamasya te nirviṣayā bhavanti // VamP_67.31 //

GP12vamp__u:9459: yeṣāṃ manasi govindo nivāsī satataṃ bale /

GP12vamp__u:9491: kiṃ japyaistasya mantrairvā kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimāśramaiḥ /

GP12vamp__u:9537: yā gatiḥ prāpyate loke tāṃ me vaktumihārhasi // VamP_68.1 //
GP12vamp__u:9539: kāni dānāni śastāni prīṇanāya jagadguroḥ // VamP_68.2 //

GP12vamp__u:9582: indhanādīni ca tathā mādhavaprīṇanāya tu // VamP_68.23 //

GP12vamp__u:9615: api naḥ sa kule kaścid viṣṇubhakto bhaviṣyati /

GP12vamp__u:9619: api naḥ santatau jāto dhvajaṃ cakeśavamandire /

GP12vamp__u:9637: itthaṃ sa nṛpatiḥ kṛtvā śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ /

GP12vamp__u:9646: evaṃ kriyāyogaratasya te 'dya nūnaṃ murāriḥ śubhado bhaviṣyati /

GP12vamp__u:9654: kriyā mahātmā yavaśarkarādyāṃ baliṃ cakārāpratimāṃ madhudruhaḥ // VamP_68.58 //

GP12vamp__u:9664: sasmāra nityaṃ haribhaṣitāni sa tasya jāto vinayāṅkuśastu // VamP_68.63 //
GP12vamp__u:9665: idaṃ ca vṛttaṃ sa papāṭha daityarāṭ smaran suvākyāni guroḥ śubhāni /
GP12vamp__u:9666: tathyāni pathyāni paratra ceha pitāmahasyendrasamasya vīraḥ // VamP_68.64 //
GP12vamp__u:9667: ye vṛddhavākyāni samācaranti śrutvā duruktānyapi pūrvatastu /

GP12vamp__u:9670: vṛddhavākyaiṣadhā nūnaṃ kurvanti kila nirviṣam // VamP_68.66 //

GP12vamp__u:9674: te śocyā banadhūnāṃ jīvanto 'pīha mṛtatulyāḥ // VamP_68.68 //
GP12vamp__u:9676: yeṣāṃ mokṣyitāre vai teṣāṃ sāntirna vidyate // VamP_68.69 //
GP12vamp__u:9679: tasmād yo vṛddhavākyāni śṛṇuyād vidadhāti ca /

GP12vamp__u:9684: etanmayā puṇyatamaṃ purāṇaṃ tubhyaṃ tathā nārada kīrtitaṃ vai /
GP12vamp__u:9685: śrutvā ca kīrtyā parayā sameto bhaktyā ca viṣṇoḥ padamabhyupaiti // VamP_69.1 //
GP12vamp__u:9688: na tasya rogā jāyante na viṣaṃ cābhicārikam /

GP12vamp__u:9690: śraṇoti nityaṃ vidhivacca bhaktyā saṃpūjayan yaḥ praṇataśca viṣṇum /

GP12vamp__u:9692: prāpnoti dattasya suvarṇabhūmeraśvasya gonāgarathasya caiva nārī naraścāpi ca pādamekaṃ śṛṇvan śuciḥ puṇyatamaḥ pṛthivyām /
GP12vamp__u:9693: 69.5 snāne kṛte tīrthavare supuṇye gaṅgājale naimiṣapuṣkare vā /
GP12vamp__u:9694: kokāmukhe yat pravadanti viprāḥ prayāgamāsādya ca māghamāse // VamP_69.6 //
GP12vamp__u:9695: sa tatphalaṃ prāpya ca vāmanasya saṃkīrtayan nānyamanāḥ padaṃ hi /

GP12vamp__u:9697: yad bhūmiloke suralokalabhye mahatsukhaṃ prāpya naraḥ samagram /
GP12vamp__u:9698: prāpanoti cāsya śravaṇānmaharṣe sautrāmaṇernāsti ca saṃśayo me // VamP_69.8 //
GP12vamp__u:9699: ratnasya dānasya ca yatphalaṃ bhaved yatsūryasya cendorgrahaṇe ca rāhoḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9700: annasya dānena phalaṃ yathoktaṃ bubhukṣite vipravare ca sāgnike // VamP_69.9 //
GP12vamp__u:9702: devāgniviprarṣirate ca pitroḥ śuśruṣake bhrātari jyeṣṭhasāmne /

GP12vamp__u:9704: caturdaśaṃ vāmanamāhuragryaṃ śrute ca yasyāghacayāśca nāśam /
GP12vamp__u:9705: prayānti nāstyatra ca saṃśayo me mahānti pāpānyapi nāradāśu // VamP_69.11 //
GP12vamp__u:9707: sarvapāpāni naśyanti vāmanasya sadā mude // VamP_69.12 //
GP12vamp__u:9708: idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ tavoktaṃ na vācyametaddharibhaktivarjite /
GP12vamp__u:9710: namo namaḥ kāraṇa vāmanāya nityaṃ yo vadenniyataṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9711: tasya viṣṇuḥ padaṃ mokṣaṃ dadāti surapūjitaḥ // VamP_69.14 //
GP12vamp__u:9713: vittaśāṭhyaṃ na kartavyaṃ kurvan śravaṇanāśakam // VamP_69.15 //
